    • Method Detail

      • generatePuzzles

        public void generatePuzzles(java.lang.Integer numOfPuzzles)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Generate puzzles - Takes in a number of puzzles to generate and then initialises that number of puzzles. Stores key index number and key in a local map for lookup and also a bin file which contains the encrypted puzzles to be sent to Bob.
        Parameters:
        numOfPuzzles - - The number of puzzles to generate.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setSelectedPuzzleNum

        public void setSelectedPuzzleNum(int puzzleNum)
        Setter for the puzzle number selected by Bob after cracking his puzzle.
        Parameters:
        puzzleNum - - The puzzle number selected by Bob.

      • sendEncryptedMessage

        public java.lang.String sendEncryptedMessage()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Send encrypted message - Looks up the key which corresponds with the number Bob selected after cracking his puzzle and then encrypts a message with that key to send back to Bob.
        Returns:
        - DES encrypted ciphertext with the agreed key between Alice and Bob.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
